alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 11:26PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern St. Louis and northeastern Carlton Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1125 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Floodwood, to near Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, to Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cloquet, Scanlon, Carlton, Thomson and Brookston around 1130 PM CDT. Saginaw around 1140 PM CDT. Hermantown and Pike Lake Near Duluth around 1145 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Canyon, City of Rice Lake, Cotton, Island Lake and Boulder Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore
